plusCode.compoundCode: Q236+MF Manhattan, New York, NY, USA

adrFormatAddress: 200 W 39th St, Manhattan, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: I tripped walking up the subway stairs this morning on my way into the office. At first I wanted to have Asurion come to me to fix my phone but would have had to wait several days. So I decided to try and go in person and was thrilled to find out there was a location around the corner. The process was very easy and smooth; you just set up an appointment on line and then walk in. Alexander was the attendant helping me and he was very nice. The only criticism I have is that you have to be sure and ask tons of questions to ensure you walk out with a clear idea of the process. You should also be sure to call in periodically to get updates because they won’t proactively do it (even if they say they will). That’s not a big deal, though, and the service was speedy; I was able to pick up my phone a few hours later and write this review!

originalText.text: My phone abruptly stopped working and I was able to get a speedy diagnosis and repair. The location is tidy and the staff was confident, professional, and kind. I highly recommend.

text.text: My phone abruptly stopped working and I was able to get a speedy diagnosis and repair. The location is tidy and the staff was confident, professional, and kind. I highly recommend.

originalText.text: Just got a new iPhone 13 Pro batter installed in my phone and I couldn’t be happier with the service. William is the guy you want when you come here, make sure to ask for him! He was super friendly and helpful throughout the whole repair and he really made my whole experience painless and stress free. Highly recommend him and this store for any tech repairs!

He was super friendly and helpful throughout the whole repair and he really made my whole experience painless and stress free. Highly recommend him and this store for any tech repairs!

originalText.text: Drop my phone while visiting New York City. It was extremely stressed with us. Of course not much you can do without a phone. I walked in and was able to get my phone repaired in less than an hour. The technician was extremely polite and helpful. So grateful they were open!

text.text: Drop my phone while visiting New York City. It was extremely stressed with us. Of course not much you can do without a phone. I walked in and was able to get my phone repaired in less than an hour. The technician was extremely polite and helpful. So grateful they were open!

originalText.text: I came very frustrated with my phone completely shattered from a terrible repair and William helped within minutes. He was extremely helpful and repaired my phone in less then 15 minutes. I’m very grateful and definitely will be returning to him. Thank you for your help.
